snippet: The 2015 Big Ears Festival packs three days with performances by the Kronos Quartet, Terry Riley, Rhiannon Giddens and more.
abstract: The 2015 Big Ears Festival packs three days with performances by the Kronos Quartet, Terry Riley, Rhiannon Giddens and more.

headline.main: A Season's Worth of Music in a Weekend at Knoxville's Big Ears Festival
headline.print_headline: A New York Accent At Knoxville Festival
